Title: Skywarden
Intro: A Skywarden is armed with an Ithilmar Blade and one of the following weapon options: Zephyr trident; or Swifthawk Pennant.

Rules.Name: Mount
Rules.Rule: MOUNT: This unit can have a Skycutter mount that is pulled by a Swiftfeather Hawk armed with Raking Talons.

Rules.Name: Crew
Rules.Rule: CREW: If this unit has a Skycutter mount, it is crewed by a Swifthawk Agent armed with an Agent’s Blade and Spear.

Rules.Name: Enchanted Shield
Rules.Rule: ABILITIES You can add 1 to save rolls for attacks that target this unit.

Rules.Name: Swifthawk Pennant
Rules.Rule: If this unit is armed with a Swifthawk Pennant, it gains the TOTEM keyword and you can add 1 to wound rolls for attacks made by friendly SWIFTHAWK AGENTS units within 16" of this unit.

Rules.Name: Windrider
Rules.Rule: If this unit has a Skycutter mount, in the shooting phase, it has a Save characteristic of 4+ instead of 5+.

Rules.Name: Fleet Of Wing
Rules.Rule: Fleet of Wing: If this unit has a Skycutter mount, roll 2D6 instead of single dice when making a run roll for it.

Rules.Name: Swoop And Attack!
Rules.Rule: Swoop and Attack!: Once per battle, in your charge phase, you can say that this unit will sound the attack. If you do so, friendly SWIFTHAWK AGENTS units can attempt a charge in that phase even if they ran in the same turn.
